programme.title: Wildest Africa: Madagascar: Islands of Monsters

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Ngorongoro: Born of Fire
programme.desc: Ngorongoro is thought to have formed about 2.5 million years ago from a large volcano, whose cone collapsed inward after a major eruption. This fertile land is full of wildlife, from cunning hyena and proud lions to vast herds of wildebeest and elephants.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Philippines: Islands of Mystery

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Virungas: Land of Ice and Fire

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Caribbean: The Wild Side of Paradise

programme.title: A Haunted House

programme.title: The Final Cut

programme.title: Andromeda: The Banks of the Lethe
programme.desc: A black hole allows Dylan to communicate with his former fiancée, 300 years in the past.

programme.title: Andromeda: A Rose in the Ashes
programme.desc: Dylan is imprisoned on a prison planet and must stage an escape as his crew tries to stage their own rescue.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Castalians board the Andromeda to finalize the charter for the New Commonwealth. When the leader is discovered dead, Tyr is the main suspect.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Now You See Me
programme.desc: 26-year-old deaf woman Alexa Cullen vanished from her home in Manaia, on the Coromandel Peninsular in 1995. She had a history of hitch-hiking and police suspected she’d run away. But three years later, ominous rumors began circulating in the community.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Taken for a Ride
programme.desc: 54 year old Simon Buis was savagely beaten and kicked to death in an Auckland park in 1980 by persons unknown. To this day, his killers have evaded capture.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Without Warning
programme.desc: This week’s episode of Sensing Murder promises greater co-operation between psychics and police, attempting to uncover the truth about the death of 18-year-old apprentice plumber Regan O’Donoghue, who was killed in a hit and run in 2007.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Taken Out
programme.desc: Was Donovan Reidy deliberately run down and left to die? In 1995, 23-year-old Donovan Reidy was at a party when he got into a fight. A short while later, his bloodied body was found on the side of a major New Zealand highway.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: A Killer Amongst Us: The Norfolk Island Murder
programme.desc: On Easter Sunday 2002, on sleepy Norfolk Island in the south west Pacific, the body of 29-year-old Janelle Patton was found lying in an open field.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Gonzales Family Murders
programme.desc: On July 10, 2001, Sef Gonzales murdered his sister Clodine, 18, mother Mary Loiva Josephine, 43, and his father Teddy, 46, in their North Ryde home.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Kimberley Killer
programme.desc: Seven years after the disappearance of baby Azaria Chamberlain at Ayers rock, long before the murder of Peter Falconio on a remote stretch of highway in the Australian outback and two years before Ivan Milat begins his reign of backpacker murders.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Thrill Kill: The Janine Balding Murder
programme.desc: On a September night in 1986, two police officers climbed through a barbed-wire fence beside the F4 freeway at Minchinbury in Sydney’s west.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Murder of Innocence: Sian Kingi
programme.desc: On 27 November 1987, 12-year-old Noosa school girl Sian Kingi was grabbed off her push bike by Valmae Fay Beck and Barrie John Watts as she rode home from school.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Sisters Are Doing It For Themselves
programme.desc: Regan tries to reconcile with her wild-at-heart sister Grace McLeod, after Grace inherits part-ownership of Drovers Run. Riley is seduced by a sexy cowgirl, with disastrous results while Kate is determined to prove her bizarre farming methods to Marcus.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Alex's plan to propose to Stevie goes horribly wrong, when a series of accidents and disasters threaten to ruin their relationship.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Bloodlines
programme.desc: When sheep rustlers steal Drovers Run's breeding stock, Grace takes the law into her own hands. Regan struggles to convince Grace to stay permanently at Drovers Run.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Warts and All
programme.desc: Bryce resorts to blackmail to force Alex and Stevie into signing a pre-nuptial agreement. Stevie takes drastic action to avoid being pigeonholed as "Mrs. Alex Ryan".

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Conflict of Interests
programme.desc: Alex takes drastic action to lodge his marriage licence application in time.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Lynne Zappone, the Chief Talent Officer of Popeye’s Louisiana Kitchen, a restaurant chain that generates more than $2 billion in annual revenue, goes undercover posing as a participant in a reality show called Job Swap.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: PJ’s Pets is one of the nation’s oldest pet store chains, but the company has a new President in place, and she’s determined to rattle a few cages. Margaret Kordas steps out of her stilettos when she spends a week working in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dan Dizio is the CEO of the fastest growing pretzel bakery on the East Coast, Philly Pretzel Factory. Dan goes undercover as Michael Downs, a data entry processor who will be switching jobs with Philly Pretzel employees.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Pizza Pizza CEO Paul Goddard goes undercover in the nation’s number one pizza mega brand, and learns that making dough and delivering pizza serves up some challenges he never imagined.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Tigner, the president of Kendall-Jackson Wine Estates, the second largest family owned wine company in the world, goes undercover posing as a grocery store employee who is pursuing his dream job in the wine industry.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Congress Theater
programme.desc: TAPS heads to Chicago Illinois to investigate a Chicago landmark for nearly a century, the Congress Theater.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Ghosts From Hale
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Coventry, Connecticut to investigate the Nathan Hale Homestead. Nathan Hale was an American Patriot who fought in the Revolutionary War and was executed by the Britishfor being a spy.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Paranormal Pioneers
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Gloucester, Massachusetts to investigate Hammond Castle.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Overdue For Death
programme.desc: Newly designated as a \\"Literary Landmark,\\" this library is consumed with ghostly visitors with a thirst for knowledge.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Signals From the Past
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, the TAPS team is on Rose Island to investigate their haunted lighthouse. This island housed cholera victims exiled from Newport, and many of the sick never returned to the mainland.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mother Knows Best
programme.desc: Dog has two fugitives to catch, and he gets help from the unlikeliest sources - the fugitives' mothers. First, Ginger's mother wants to revoke her daughter's bond. Then, Brandon's mother decides to revoke his bond because Brandon has an ice habit.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Irons in the Fire
programme.desc: Dog is back hunting in the big city of Denver, but chasing fugitives on the mainland is more dangerous than ever. So Dog decides that the crew should get pepper-ball guns, which have much better range than pepper spray.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rocky Mountain Roundup
programme.desc: Dog decides to help two of his bondsmen buddies, Dave "Red" Widhelm and "Downtown" Bobby Brown. First up is Red, who has a client, named Alvin, whose bond is $20,000. Then the team goes after Craig, a client of Bobby's whose bond is almost $70,000.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: This One's For You
programme.desc: Dog leads the team on another adrenaline-filled chase in Denver. The fugitive, Robert, has a habit of address-hopping that makes him a difficult target, but Dog refuses to give up and finally tracks Robert down in his latest hideaway.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Baby Lyssa Steps Up
programme.desc: The team is still in Colorado, and today Dog starts his day by to giving his kids and crew a sample of their western heritage by taking them horseback riding. This hunt takes Dog back to his old stomping grounds in Denver.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Running on Empty
programme.desc: Dog's time is running out in Colorado. After a month of helping his bail bondsmen friends around Denver, he's got to get his family back home to Hawaii. But Dog wants one more capture before they leave.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Inside Out
programme.desc: Dog kickstarts the search for Jackson, a 240lbs, six feet tall bad boy who has skipped out on a $10,000 bond. Jackson’s apparently at his father-in-law's house, but the father-in-law has info about Jackson that brings Dog to a unique hideout.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Growing Up Is Hard To Do
programme.desc: With twelve kids of his own, Dog knows how hard it is to keep children on the straight and narrow, especially during their turbulent teens.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Year of the Dog
programme.desc: A one-hour special that looks back at 2006, one of Dog's most tumultuous years, which has included the passing of Beth's father, Dog and Beth's wedding, the tragic death of Dog's daughter Barbara.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Mystery of Mona Lisa
programme.desc: When Lyssa points out that the fugitive in the next case has the same birth date as Barbara, Dog's recently deceased daughter, the team takes a special vow to capture the young woman.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Disappearing Acts
programme.desc: After Willie and Jase lose Si's tea cup, Si makes them go to great lengths to find it. When the entertainment for Gus's 1st birthday party falls through, Jep fills in as a magician.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Dance Dads
programme.desc: Willie, Korie, Jase and Missy take dance lessons from Sadie to prepare for Reed and Rebecca's upcoming weddings. Jase's plan to perform Reed's wedding ceremony may fall through when he waits until the last minute to renew his ordainment.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: End of an Era
programme.desc: When Si decides to retire to pursue a music career, the family organizes a party in his honor. Meanwhile, Willie, Phil, and Jase take a road trip to try to recreate an old duck call for Si's retirement gift.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Looking Back and Talking Quack
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a look back at 130 episodes of Duck Dynasty.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Grass & The Furious
programme.desc: It's all hands on deck for the Duckmen when an old high school nemesis challenges them to a good old-fashioned race.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Driving Miss Sadie
programme.desc: With Sadie's driver's license test fast approaching, she finds herself in dire need of lessons. Willie, Jase and Si each set out to correct her glaring failures behind the wheel by teaching her how to drive... Robertson-style.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Truck Commander
programme.desc: After Willie's son, John Luke, leaves Willie's pickup in the driveway with a bone-dry gas tank, Willie and Korie decide that it's time to get the kid his own car.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Si-Yonara
programme.desc: The Duck Commander assembly room gets an unexpected shakeup when a disgruntled Si decides to quit his job.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Heaven’s Gate
programme.desc: Bryan Jr. feels the heat to recreate the cozy log home a British Columbia couple lost to a fire. Meanwhile, Peter hopes for a ticket to heaven by building a covered entrway for the local church.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Under the Gun
programme.desc: While Beat constructs a luxury fishing lodge in northern British Columbia, Bryan Jr. is covered into giving the local gun shop a much-needed facelift.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Cowboy Confidential
programme.desc: Beat and Andre are lassoed into building an elaborate carved archway for the Williams Lake Stampede. Meanwhile, Joel wrangles a rookie crew to construct a vacation home in the wilds of Wisconsin.

programme.title: Timber Kings: History Lessen
programme.desc: Bryan Sr. and Joel brave the British Columbia backwoods to save a historic game warden's cabin, while Beat cooks up an outdoor log kitchen for his lakeside cottage.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Where There’s Smoke
programme.desc: The heat is on Bryan Jr. to build a deluxe, log smoker for the family fishing resort. Meanwhile, Beat constructs the ultimate summer home in Ontario's lush countryside.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Speak My Truth
programme.desc: Chante says her boyfriend, Steve of 8 years is trying to end her “hot girl summer.” Not only that, but he doesn’t trust her, is controlling and wants to marry her. Chante isn’t ready for marriage and just wants to have fun.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lesbihonest
programme.desc: Porcha has had enough of Ivory's promiscuous behavior. He claims Porcha has more tricks and secrets than Houdini and her lying has taken its toll. Can Judge Lynn Toler help this couple or is it time for Cupid to take better aiming lessons?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Angry Man
programme.desc: Kadaveion and Justice’s anger issues are tearing them apart. Kadaveion doubts he fathered their baby, but Justice says he’s a liar who gave her a STD and is ready to leave him. Can Judge Toler find a solution or have they already made up their minds?

programme.title: Divorce Court: In My Feelings
programme.desc: Raymond, also known as @IamRollingRay, is an Instagram sensation who says his high school sweetheart is jealous of his social media fan base. Christian thinks Ray shows more attention to his fanbase, accusing him of cheating with his followers.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Forever My Lady
programme.desc: Despite their age gap, Tamara and Jasimine have been together for 10 years. Tamara claims Jasimine sends risque texts to other people. Jasimine claims Tamara explodes in fits of rage. Can this couple get over their age gap?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Studs Need Love Too
programme.desc: Tahani said Cymbre's jealous fits of rage has caused her to lose a job and suspects him of cheating after finding a hotel receipt! He doesn't trust her either after she cheated before. Will this couple be able to trust again or are they too far gone?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Love on Top
programme.desc: Darnesha still madly loves Pedro even though he recently had a baby with another woman and began a new relationship with a completely different woman. She wants to make it work, but Pedro is happy with his new beau. Is a divorce inevitable?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Done Done
programme.desc: Nichele says Stewart would pay the neighbors to spy on her. She says he was never supportive when it came to parenting. Stewart says Nichele has always denied cheating on him but he believes in his heart she did.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Drank Sinatra
programme.desc: Kayla's excessive drinking along with the cheating is a deal breaker from Bryan. Bryan can no longer tolerate Kayla's alcohol-fueled tantrums. She says he is controlling and doesn't put her and her child first. Can Judge Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Alpha Girl
programme.desc: Krystal is an alpha woman with a big personality and Caleb is not having it. Krystal resents him for proposing only after her father died while Caleb hates Krystal controlling their finances. Can Judge Toler help them?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lonely Nights
programme.desc: Christina says Ramon is a cheater, runs from his financial responsibilities and their sex life is in the gutter. He’s tired of her enabling his family to the point, he takes refuge in hotel rooms to get a break from her.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Caught Up
programme.desc: Syncere says Mark has lied and disrespected her on several occasions and she’s not going to stand for it anymore. Mark says he cheats on Syncere because she has a bad attitude and she gets on his nerves.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Involuntary Voluntary
programme.desc: First, Froy and Sonia head out to the farm to repossess a truck from an entitled equestrian who would rather die than let the repo team get their hands on what's in the back. Then, Lou and Sonia stumble into the middle of a prolonged business dispute...

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Secret Places
programme.desc: When Leland learns that one of his clients with a reputation for stealing has lost her co-signer and could be ready to run, Dog and the crew hop a plane to the Big Island.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Prayers and Mace
programme.desc: Both brother Tim and fellow Honolulu bondsman James need Dog's help to track down their hard to find fugitives. The two cases on the docket today are challenging, especially the hunt for Gregory, a felon with a lengthy rap sheet.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: New Dog in Town
programme.desc: It's Beth's birthday and Dog knows just what she needs. He surprises Beth with Delilah, a puppy small enough to sit in the palm of her hand. Beth is so happy that she insists on taking the puppy with her on today's bounty.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Trick or Treat
programme.desc: It's Halloween, and before Dog and Beth can help the kids carve their pumpkins, they have some business to attend to. It involves knocking on doors and meeting the neighbors but instead of hunting for treats they're on the search for a fugitive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Girl Trouble
programme.desc: Dog and the team have girl trouble in this case. Krystal jumped bail and seems to have vanished into the high plains of Colorado. To make matters worse, she's running with her lover (and bond co-signer) Carrie. But Thelma and Louise they ain't.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Seeing the Light
programme.desc: Today Leland and Dog make a quick visit to the police supply store to get some new gadgets for the team but they can't linger because they've also got a fugitive to catch. Their target is reputed to have an explosive temper.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: When a Stranger Calls
programme.desc: When an offender with a long record ducks his day in court, Bobby Brown knows whom to call - The Dog!? And knowing that few souls can resist Beth's clever persuasion, Dog gives her the job of luring the fugitive in.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Jack & Jill
programme.desc: Today's case is a twofer, a brother and sister both charged with drug related offenses. Also, Dog has crossed paths with the brother before. He once tried to stop Dog from arresting one of the most violent fugitives of his career.

programme.title: The Game: Blank Canvases
programme.desc: Blue helps Keira prepare for an audition, resulting in an intimate "first" moment for the couple. Meanwhile, after Tasha tells Rick her intentions to break things off with Pookie, she is caught off guard by animpromptu proposal instead.

programme.title: The Game: The Pre-Season Game Episode
programme.desc: Blue struggles with his feelings after learning that Keira was a virgin before she slept with him.Jason's suspicions of Chardonnay cheating with Rick comes to a head, resulting in a huge confrontation between Tasha, Jason, Chardonnay and Pookie.

programme.title: Run's House: Downward Facing Dawg
programme.desc: Seeking relief from the stress of his life, Run seeks the advice of his brother, Russell. Run decides to shadow his brother and give yoga a try in hopes that peace will find him.

programme.title: Run's House: Anger Management
programme.desc: Mom and Dad express concern over Russy's temper and decide to get professional help.

programme.title: Run's House: Baby Booming
programme.desc: When Angela decides that she needs a new dog as a fashion accessory Rev puts his foot down.

programme.title: Run's House: Victoria Anne Simmons
programme.desc: Season three picks up with a very pregnant Justine and an anxious family awaiting the birth of their new child and sibling.

programme.title: Run's House: Hangin' with Run
programme.desc: Rev Run notices that Jojo isn't spending much time at home, instead, opting to hang out with his friends away from home.

programme.title: Run's House: Weight a Minute
programme.desc: Angela feels fat and actually thinks she needs to lose fifteen to twenty pounds. Vanessa thinks she's nuts for thinking she needs to lose that much weight and tells Mom and Dad.

programme.title: Run's House: Sneaker Pimps & Mini Moguls
programme.desc: Russy tells Run he wants to make more money by selling the toys he no longer uses.

programme.title: Run's House: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: Vanessa and Angela are in desperate need of money to decorate their apartment.

programme.title: Run's House: Home Alone
programme.desc: With the release of Justine's children's book fast approaching, Run suggests a quiet, peaceful weekend away, to help her prepare for an upcoming book reading.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Invitation to Evil
programme.desc: Paula and her husband Mike are under siege by a purported shadow demon in their North Carolina home. Paula has witnessed a toddler bed levitating and heard deep growls. Michelle, Ryan and the team uncover the shocking truth behind the haunting.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Room 37
programme.desc: Darrell and Cherry, the owners of an historic Tennessee bed and breakfast built in the late 1800s, are reporting apparitions of a man and hearing whistling throughout the hotel corridors.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Messenger
programme.desc: Kelli and her husband Riley are frightened in their coastal Oregon home. They are plagued by a headless apparition and often hear mysterious noises that resemble cries for help from the dark corners of their house.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dark Practice
programme.desc: Brenda is terrified by a dark hooded figure spotted in her West Virginia home. The same entity allegedly tormented her late husband. PRS and Psychic/Medium Michelle Belanger help Brenda before she slips into the same abyss as her late husband.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Suicide Possession
programme.desc: Joan and her boyfriend Tony are seeing apparitions in their New Jersey home. Both are concerned that the spirits are influencing their behavior: a non-drinker, Tony has turned to the bottle while Joan has thoughts of harming herself.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Shape Shifter
programme.desc: PRS travels to Shapleigh, Maine where a woman and her daughter are reporting attacks from a winged creature with sharp teeth. Psychic Chip Coffey arrives and senses a half-human, half animal presence.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Darkness Falls
programme.desc: Ryan leads his team to one of the most haunted places in the US to confront their fears and solve a paranormal mystery. Aside from the alleged spirits of dead prisoners, something even darker may be lurking inside West Virginia State Penitentiary.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Connection
programme.desc: P.R.S. is called in to help a young mother tormented by an otherworldly connection to a teenage girl murdered in her neighborhood years ago. Could she have psychic ability or is there a more sinister force at work?

programme.title: Most Haunted: Fort Paull Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2. The Most Haunted team explore the underground of Fort Paull. With its foundations and footprint dating back 100’s of years the team are faced with some terrifying ordeals.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Annison Funeral Parlour
programme.desc: Coffins, murder and a malevolent spirit plague the team as they investigate this one-time funeral home. With one member isolated alone another in a coffin the team catch a poltergeist in action

programme.title: Most Haunted: Wentworth Woodhouse Part 1
programme.desc: Part 1. The upper floors of Wentworth House are a maze of corridors and rooms and the team have one night to investigate as many as possible. With one whistling spirit, groans and loud noises the team are shaken to their core.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Wentworth Woodhouse Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2. The underbelly of this great house is a sharp contrast to its upper grandeur. Some members of the team are forced to run while other are lost in the labyrinth of tunnels and passageways pursued by something unnatural.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Oakwell House
programme.desc: The team investigate Oakwell House near Leeds, which was built by ancestors of Fred Batt. In 1684, William Batt returned unexpectedly from a trip to London but vanished leaving a bloody footprint. A demon dog has been seen in the grounds.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Divine Madness
programme.desc: A construction company tycoon now believes he's King Arthur, and his estranged son determines to have him declared incompetent. Can Jonathan work a reconciliation?

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Catch A Falling Star
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark have been hired to look after the kids of a movie star who never has time to spend with his family.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Help Wanted: Angel
programme.desc: An elderly scriptwriter needs someone to bankroll his movie. Meanwhile, Mark has fallen in love with an attractive woman, but Jonathan receives news about her from higher up.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Dust Child
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark must help an Amerasian girl facing racial prejudice when she goes to live with her father's family in the United States.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Hotel Of Dreams
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark are bellhops at a hotel that has been given to an aimless young man by his father. They must deal with an unkind boss, an obnoxious kid and a difficult guest.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 8
programme.desc: Du Plessis comes to meet Caroline's plane but he doesn't seem happy – he has seen that the mining company have already started building the road which threatens Leopard's Den.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 9

programme.desc: A man in a retirement home dreams of a woman holding back a monster, and in real life realizes the woman is his cataleptic neighbor.

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica
programme.desc: Commander Adama is trapped in a compromising courtship with a woman from his past; while an unwilling sheriff is forced to defend inhabitants of a farming community against vicious, pig-like creatures called Borays, who have killed all previous sheriffs.

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica
programme.desc: Starbuck, after crash-landing on the planet of Trillion, is rescued by a band of children who later decide to ransom the colonial warrior to the Cylons in exchange for their imprisoned father.

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica
programme.desc: Humanity is threatened with annihilation when Adama engages in a fierce conflict with the hot-blooded commander of another battlestar, who's obsessed with leading both ships in a suicidal attack on the Cylons.

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica
programme.desc: Surrounded by Cylon warships, Commander Adama reluctantly joins forces with the glory-hungry Commander (played by guest star Lloyd Bridges) of the battlestar Pegasus in a desperate surprise attack on their Cylon enemies.

programme.title: Green Eyed Killers: Ashley Mead

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Beverly Allitt

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: John Sweeney
programme.desc: John Sweeney brutally murdered two of his girlfriends, dismembered their bodies and dumped them in canals. In a macabre twist, he hid clues in his abstract paintings, and five other girlfriends of his are currently still missing.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: The Moors Murders
programme.desc: An investigation into the Moors Murderers, Myra Hindley and Ian Brady, with interviews with the family of Keith Bennett.

programme.desc: The harrowing story of EastEnders actress Gemma McCluskie, who was murdered by her older brother in the flat they shared in east London in 2012.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: The Murder Of Stephen Cameron
programme.desc: Gripping documentary examining the fatal stabbing of 21-year-old motorist Stephen Cameron during a motorway altercation in 1996.

programme.title: Secrets In The Ice: Siberia's Frozen Necropolis
programme.desc: Researchers find a mummy buried in a strange way. A legendary polar exploration vehicle goes missing in Antarctica. A glacier cave on Mt. St. Helens is explored. An island in the Bering Sea may contain clues to the extinction of the woolly mammoth.

programme.title: Encounter: UFO: Mass Sightings

programme.title: Encounter: UFO: Hot Spots

programme.title: Encounter: UFO: Physical Contact

programme.title: Moesha: Reunion

programme.title: Moesha: Chain Chain Chain

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: London Northside

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Wicklow

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Devon Revisits

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Bristol

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Oxfordshire

programme.title: World's Greatest: Volcanoes
programme.desc: There are few sights on earth as compelling as a volcanic eruption. Volcanoes have the potential to cause death and widespread destruction in a heartbeat, but they also give rise to new life and ecosystems.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Drives
programme.desc: A journey by road expands our horizons, allowing us to explore the depth and breadth of whole countries and continents, stopping whenever and wherever we chose.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Forest Animals
programme.desc: Forest Animals gets up close with bears, koalas, moose, wolves, weaver ants, and Tasmanian Devils. This episode roves dark forests floors and soars above vast canopies of green in America, China, Laos, and Australia.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Jungle Animals
programme.desc: Encounter gorillas and orangutans, killer tree-dwelling pythons, delightful monkeys, awe-inspiring tigers, and millions of land-dwelling red crabs in Australia, the islands of Southeast Asia, Africa, and the Amazon.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Coasts
programme.desc: Along coasts, one element ends and another begins. No two days are ever the same on a coastline: the only thing that remains a constant is the timeless power of the sea.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Port Cities
programme.desc: Some of the most stunning cities are port cities - Sydney, Rio, Cape Town - and are also some of the most culturally diverse and vibrant. The great maritime cities of the world bridge countries and continents and unite the global community.

programme.title: Arthur: Francine's Split Decision/Muffy Goes Metropolitan
programme.desc: Lakewood Elementary is sure to win the big bowling tournament on Saturday, but Francine's cousin is having his Bar Mitzvah at the same time! Muffy happily accepts an invitation to spend the weekend in the bustling Crown City.

programme.title: Arthur: Sleep No More/Pet Peeved
programme.desc: Buster is convinced that Pizza Paula's all-you-can-eat contest is his destiny. But how can he possibly win such an important contest without any sleep? Binky volunteers to look after Francine's cat, Nemo, for the weekend.

programme.title: Arthur: Prunella's Tent of Portent/Mutiny on the Pitch
programme.desc: At the Elwood City Picnic, Prunella pretends she can see the future at her fortune telling booth. The Lakewood Elementary soccer team has had enough of Francine's bossy behavior.

programme.title: Arthur: Francine Redecorates/Arthur The Loser
programme.desc: Francine and Catherine are very different, but it’s no fun if you're two sisters sharing the same room. Then, there's only one thing in life Arthur really wants—to win! But he just can't stop losing. Is it really so wrong to cheat a little?

programme.title: Arthur: The Chronicles of Buster/On this Spot
programme.desc: Buster learns that special effects can't take the place of hard work when conquering real mountains. Arthur is thrilled to find out that Sitting Bull once passed through town! He rallies the residents to mark the spot with a monument.

programme.title: Arthur: When Duty Calls – Parts 1 & 2
programme.desc: Ladonna finds out the Army is transferring her dad to Oregon, and the whole Compson family is moving again. Fern and the others can tell Ladonna is upset, but don’t know how to help. What can they do to make the transition easier?

programme.title: Arthur: Fernfern and the Secret of Moose Mountain/Thanks a Lot, Binky
programme.desc: Fern can't wait to climb Moose Mountain so that she can have adventures like Zutzut, the famous comic-book hero! Then, Binky decides to become "No More Mr. Nice Guy" after not getting thanked for saving Rattles from a dangerous stunt.

programme.title: Arthur: The Last of Mary Moo Cow/Bitzi's Beau
programme.desc: When Mary Moo Cow is cancelled, D.W. is devastated. How can television--or life as she knows it--ever be the same? Buster hasn't yet met Bitzi's new boyfriend, but he fears the worst. What if he is a Mom-stealer?

programme.title: Arthur: Maria Speaks/Postcards from Binky
programme.desc: Maria has always been a silent fixture in Mr. Ratburn's third-grade class. But her time to speak has finally come. Can she fix her stutter? When Binky's grandparents miss his big soccer game, he decides to film a video reenactment.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Kwajalein
programme.desc: Examining the battle at the Kwajelein Atoll in the South Pacific during 1944. Included: operations by the Seabees.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Battle in Palau (Summer 1944)
programme.desc: As the United States prepared for the invasion of the Philippines, scheduled for late 1944, the tiny Palau Islands had to be taken first.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: D-Day (June 6,1944)
programme.desc: D-Day, the 6th of June--one of the most pivotal moments in world history. In a massive armada of thousands of ships, 3,000,000 allied troops land at Three Beaches in Normandy, France.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Retaking France
programme.desc: Six weeks after the D-Day invasion of the Beaches of Normandy, the allied forces are pushing the Germans back through the French countryside. Town by town is won back as Panzer divisions retreat back to the Meuse River.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Operation Dragoon (August 1944)
programme.desc: The Allies break into France and push the Germans back to their own border.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Liberation of the Paris
programme.desc: Both political and military expediency were factors in the return of the French capital to its people.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Arnhem
programme.desc: The Allies launch an attack designed to push the Germans back to the Rhine River.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory
programme.desc: Gen. Douglas MacArthur's return to the Philippines, and the final push to retake the islands after two years of Japanese occupation.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: The Last Stronghold (November 1944)
programme.desc: American B-29 high-altitude bomber attacks Japan near the end of World War II.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Mount Belvedere
programme.desc: The Battle of the Gothic Line in 1944.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Former model Jayme has learned that her online boyfriend is not only fake, but appears to be catfishing other women too! Nev and Max help find the catfish to put an end to his deception. (S5, ep13)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Lucille & Kidd Cole
programme.desc: Lucille led a simple life until she was asked to work for music producer Kidd Cole. Companies were never paid and one day Kidd couldn't be found. Will she get the answers she needs?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Luis has fallen for a single mum, and now he's ready to take their online relationship to the next level. But first Nev and Max must help him make sure that she is who she says she is! (S5, ep19)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Luke & Amy
programme.desc: Drummer Luke first started talking to nurse Amy when she came to one of his gigs 6 months ago. They had an instant spark but unfortunately every time they try and meet she cancels. (S2, ep9)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Mario & Hannah
programme.desc: After turning his life around, Mario met his soulmate, Hannah. But she refuses to speak on the phone and won't meet in person. Julie and Oobah try to find out who his dream girl really is. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: After months of sexting with a hot model he met on a hookup app, Marvin is eager to meet him in person. Max and sidekick, singer Chantal Claret, agree to help Marvin find his crush. (S6, ep5)

programme.title: Ex on the Beach
programme.desc: Hold onto your bikinis, Ex On The Beach is back, and with more exes than ever! Zahida and Maisie clash over Sean, but when the first Ex blasts onto the beach the fighting really kicks in. (S6, ep1)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Burden of Proof
programme.desc: Following the disappearance, in Jan. 1997, of 33-year-old Beverly Watson, her husband, Jim, became a prime suspect. Watson insisted that he was innocent. Police noticed that Jim was wearing makeup to conceal what appeared to be scratches on his face.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Mr. Wonderful
programme.desc: Nicknamed "Mr. Wonderful" by one of his victims, Matt Mathews was everything to the women who lost both their hearts and bank accounts to the prolific con artist. Married at least 11 times, Mathews is believed to have scammed hundreds of people.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Terror at the Morgue
programme.desc: Dr. O.C. Smith, a medical examiner, was apparently attacked on June 1, 2002, as he was leaving work. He was found wrapped in barbed wire with a bomb strapped to his neck. Dr. Smith survived but expressed concern that his assailant might attack again

programme.title: 48 Hours: SolveThis Case: Who Killed Kay Wenal
programme.desc: Investigators ask for the public's help to solve the 2008 murder of Kay Wenal, a former model found dead in her home in Georgia.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Spies, Lies and Secrets
programme.desc: A report about the death of Shane Todd, a brilliant, high-tech engineer at a Singapore company who, according to his parents, was murdered because he was unwilling to share secrets that could harm the United States.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Prime Suspect
programme.desc: Billy Fox, 33, is a devoted father of two and a soccer coach. He appears to be an all-around regular guy. But he’s booked for the death of a baby. It's a charge that could put him in prison for the rest of his life.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Wheels
programme.desc: In the country of Valeria, the IMF must assure that the corrupt Nationalist party's rigged voting machine doesn't give them the election.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Ransom
programme.desc: Mobster Frank Egan kidnaps the daughter of Dan's friend and uses her as a hostage to force Dan and the team to break out a key witness, Augie Gorman, against him.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Elena
programme.desc: Double-agent Elena Del Barra is acting bizarrely, sending a microfilm of defense secrets from her own country. Rollin is sent in to investigate and return the microfilm without its theft ever being detected.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Zubrovnik's Ghost
programme.desc: The wife of a deceased scientist, Kurt Zubrovnik, is being pressured by Eastern forces to work for them.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Trial
programme.desc: Josef Varsh plans to put an American on trial on false charges, discredit the West, and gain power.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: When he tries to join some older kids in jump-roping, Daniel fails miserably. He becomes convinced that he’s just too little to do anything right.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Marcos accidentally breaks an Art Show project that Melanie has made. A Park Kid named Myra has decided she doesn't like her name.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ is waiting for a very special letter from his pen pal in China. Everyone is anxiously awaiting Mrs. Matuma’s Harambee Dance Troupe to arrive.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Home Sweet Earth
programme.desc: It's Earth Day, a great time for everyone to learn how to help take car of our world, but Ben is wasting paper while BJ isn't too concerned about cutting down a tree to make room for a new playground.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Layla and her friends celebrate her birthday in the park with foods that aren’t traditionally American.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: The Music Box
programme.desc: The kids are having a yard sale, getting rid of old toys, books and clothes. Kioko shows up holding a prized possession—a music box from Switzerland. By accident, Ben includes the music box in a cardboard box of yard sale items!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Puppy Love
programme.desc: Barney and the kids help Mr. Boyd prepare his dog Bingo for a trip to the veterinarian for a check, while learning lessons about caring for dogs at the same time. Meanwhile, BJ is searching for his missing baseball, which he suspects was buried by Bingo.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Venice, Anyone?
programme.desc: Emma can't play with her friends because she has to complete a school project about her family. Before you know it, Barney brings Emma on a trip to Venice to learn more about her great granddad.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Everything's Bigger in Texas
programme.desc: Winchester 1886 rifle invented to kill buffalo; collection of 1950s electric Slot Cars.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Knuckle Dust
programme.desc: 1870s French Jarre Dolne Knuckle Duster revolver-knife-brass knuckle combo, a rare original George Rodrigue "Blue Dog" screenprint and a 1980 autographed Raging Bull movie poster.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Carnies & Armories
programme.desc: A tough group of bidders team up to take down Ton and Allen at auction. After a couple of wins, the guys try to sell an arsenal used by Native Americans and some vintage carnival gear. But will they get conned?

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Voodoo Moola
programme.desc: Allen & Ton hit a storage auction in Louisiana's Capitol City and quickly find themselves in trouble with the law! The guys uncover a pair of racing lawnmowers and then stumble on an antique barber chair from the early 1900s!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Dead Aim
programme.desc: Ton & Allen face-off against an auction buyer with shady bidding tactics and even more questionable fashion sense. The guys find a custom-built monowheel & a rifle designed to ward off grave robbers in the early 19th century!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Missouri Loves Company
programme.desc: On a visit to see Ton's sister in Missouri for some rafting and relaxation, the guys hit up a fast-paced live auction. After some tough losses, Ton and Allen score a ballista and an anvil set made for an explosive sport.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Machine Gun Ton
programme.desc: Ton and Allen battle a pair of vicious female auction hunters who have an axe to grind and bid based on spite rather than strategy. And a gatling gun & suit of armor are worth much less than the guys expected.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Blazing Saddles
programme.desc: Ton and Allen head to a Hollywood auction and face a new competitor with a seemingly endless cash flow. After they uncover a triple barrel shotgun and an antique camel saddle, Allen confronts an old childhood fear.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Beantown Bidders
programme.desc: 1800s blackpowder whaling harpoon; 1940s Schwinn Town & Country tandem bicycle; a vintage American flag collection that could be worth thousands.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Smoking Ton
programme.desc: WW2 Stuart M3 tank barrel and heavy duty tank treads; rare, collectors' 1890 silver inlayed humidor; high-end industrial meat slicer in the ultimate restaurant unit.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Miami Heat
programme.desc: All-terrain Air Commander Hovercraft, a 1970s NASA countdown clock and a one-of-a-kind 1960s Delta Relay rocket.

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Amber is shocked when Gary asks her to move onto his property. Catelynn pursues a career in microblading. Bentley starts therapy and Maci's heartbroken when she finds out he feels neglected. (S9, ep2)

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Where Have You Been?
programme.desc: An explosive family brawl leaves Jade caught between Sean and her parents. DeVoin's family reappears in Briana and Nova's lives after being absent for years. (S10, ep6)

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Dilemmas and Debacles
programme.desc: Jade is caught between her mum and Sean, but a drug test could reveal the truth. Leah is forced to balance her growing concerns for Ali and supporting her sister during childbirth. (S10, ep7)

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Impossible Choice
programme.desc: Tensions erupt when Jade asks her parents to move out. After an x-ray, Leah grapples with the possibility that Ali's condition is progressing. Briana and family move into their new house. (S10, ep8)

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Piece of Me

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Do Something

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac continues the investigation into the murder of Chief Carver's sister.

programme.title: CSI: Miami

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The CSIs investigate the brutal murder of a therapist's daughter.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team are called to a fashion boutique when a young girl is killed in an explosion.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A baby is snatched from her mother's arms by a professional kidnapper.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: My First Case

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Abduction

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Forge of Creation
programme.desc: Lili, Vorjak, and the baby flee to find a shuttle to escape Earth. Liam and Sandoval are both tracking them - for different reasons. Augur is on the run from volunteers, but sends a friend (Juliet) to help Liam while he's gone.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: First Breath
programme.desc: A college friend of Renee's resurfaces and leads them on an investigation of the link between the Taelons and a biomedical facility's cloning operation.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Sins of the Father

programme.title: The Lost World: London Calling

programme.title: 48 Hours: Temptation in Texas
programme.desc: A report about the 2011 shooting death of Greg Williams, and the question of whether he was killed with his own gun by an intruder inside his suburban Dallas home - as his wife Michele Williams has claimed - or if Michele herself was guilty of the crime.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Scared to Death
programme.desc: Police Lt. Jim Barton found his wife, Vickie, murdered execution-style on their farm in Warren County, Ohio, in 1995. With limited physical evidence and no suspects, the investigation lay dormant for nine years until a tip opened the case.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Family's Shame
programme.desc: The broadcast presents accounts of people who suffer the reality that a close relative has committed murder and endure the struggle between family ties and civic responsibility.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Murder They Wrote: The End of the Dream

programme.title: 48 Hours: The War in Chicago
programme.desc: The street violence, gang activity and drug trafficking in Chicago.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Crime and Punishment
programme.desc: Two women fight to keep the man convicted of killing their mother over 20 years earlier in prison, though he maintains his innocence.
